CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(OR( Account__c = '', ISNULL(Account__c))) , 'Account', IF( NOT(OR( Campaign__c = '', ISNULL(Campaign__c))) , 'Campaign', IF( NOT(OR( Contact__c = '', ISNULL(Contact__c ))) , 'Contact', IF( NOT(OR( Opportunity__c = '', ISNULL(Opportunity__c ))) , 'Opportunity', Contact__c ) )))
CustomField.label: Relationship Type
